channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Judge in Boston to consider latest bid to block Trump’s birthright citizenship order
item.description: A federal judge in Boston will consider a request from 18 states to block President Donald Trump’s executive order ending birthright citizenship for the children of parents who are in the U.S. illegally.

item.title: Trump administration sues Chicago in latest crackdown on ‘sanctuary’ cities
US border czar blames leaks for hindering immigration raids in Colorado suburb spotlighted by Trump
